CustomField.description: Email subject used on Docusign as default.
CustomField.formula: SoWNameCongaAuto__c &" - "& CASE(SoWLanguage__c , 'English',"Please Review and Sign", 'German',"Bitte einsehen und unterzeichnen", "Please Review and Sign" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Email subject used on Docusign as default.
CustomField.label: SoW Docusign Email Subject
